<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns a list of button names assigned to the given user action. You can find the action names in config class ControllerSchemes or [[:Category:Key_Actions|user action names]]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>'''actionKeysNamesArray''' userAction </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>


</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] - Name of the action </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNamesArray''' [userAction, maxKeys] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys]: [[Array]]</value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> userAction: [[String]] - Name of the action </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - Maximum number of keys to return </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER23</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s3</name>=<value> '''actionKeysNamesArray''' [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority] &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ''(Since Arma 3 v1.35.127928)''</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX3</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p31</name>=<value> [userAction, maxKeys, inputDevicePriority]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER31</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p32</name>=<value> UserAction: [[String]] - Name of the action </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER32</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p33</name>=<value> maxKeys: [[Number]] - Maximum number of keys to return </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER33</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p34</name>=<value> inputDevicePriority: [[String]] - Result sorted by inputDevicePriority with values:
* <tt>"Mouse"</tt>
* <tt>"Keyboard"</tt>
* <tt>"Stick"</tt>
* <tt>"Gamepad"</tt>
* <tt>"Tracker"</tt>
* <tt>"Combo"</tt> (mouse and keyboard combinations)
* <tt>"Controler"</tt> (any controller other than mouse or keyboard)
Other values are considered as: 
* <tt>"Unsorted"</tt> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER34</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r3</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[String|Strings]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>list = [[actionKeysNamesArray]] "ReloadMagazine";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>list = [[actionKeysNamesArray]] ["ReloadMagazine", 1];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[actionKeys]], [[actionKeysImages]], [[actionKeysNames]], [[actionName]], [[inputAction]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
